main event: A bright object streaked across the sky in SW Libya, stopped suddenly, climbed at a high acceleration, and then disappeared. A radar set detected a blip soon after, increasing in speed and altitude before disappearing. The sighting may have a remote connection to recent Egyptian-Israeli space capability clash.
interesting points: The object exhibited rapid acceleration and stopped suddenly, displaying unusual behavior.

The report mentions an elliptical object with intermittent bright blue flashes, reflecting into the cockpit of the aircraft, indicating an unusual light phenomenon.
The navigator observed a jamming pattern on the radar set, suggesting potential interference by the observed object.
